feed.title: Changes to BIP-360 - Pay to Quantum Resistant Hash (P2QRH)

entry.title: Changes to BIP-360 - Pay to Quantum Resistant Hash (P2QRH)
entry.summary: The message provides an update on a recent change that the sender has implemented, with a link to the specific alteration detailed on GitHub ([here's what it looks like](https://github.com/cryptoquick/bips/pull/26)). The sender is addressing Steven Roose directly, indicating that if Roose finds the changes acceptable and agrees to merge them, the sender requests acknowledgment in the relevant Bitcoin Improvement Proposals (BIP) discussion thread. This acknowledgment is sought due to Roose's name being associated with the BIP following the suggested changes. The tone suggests a collaborative effort and a step towards consensus among contributors involved in the development and improvement of Bitcoin protocols.
